channel.title: Humility on Jessica S. Marquis
channel.description: Recent content in Humility on Jessica S. Marquis

item.title: Fits and starts
item.description: I am no stranger to inconsistency. I know how to start a project with passion and drive…and never finish it. I have a spotty history of coming and going in friendships and commitments. And, as a native Detroiter, I have weathered the vacillating reputations of the Pistons and the Tigers (although the Lions have been fairly consistent through the years). And then something happened. Namely, The Message version of Ephesians 4:2:
